Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's someone collapsed on the ground
here outside the farm! Let's get her
inside! Help me!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Put her down gently. That's it.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, can you bring her some water?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Gah! Don't touch me, you old fool!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Y-You collapsed outside, so <MYNAME>
and I helped you out...

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Collapsed? Me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL><NAME_UNKOWN>Hmmm, yes, I remember! The sun was very
bright, and I got quite dizzy and passed
out! I normally only go out at night.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What brings you to our fair town, then?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>I've heard the rumors of a town where
things have improved a lot recently.
So I've come to make some money!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. I'm glad to see you up and about
again, anyway.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Great timing, anyway. You can show me to
the inn here in town. I'm going to stay
here tonight.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
M-Me? I guess I can do that. What's your
name?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>I'm <BLUE>Sandra</BLUE>. Nice name, eh? What's your
names, then?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. Come then, Dunhill. Show me where
I can find a bed.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Very well. Come with me. I'll see you
later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Like I just said, <MYNAME>. I'm here in
town on business.
<PAGE>
I'm going to be running my shop at <BLUE>night</BLUE>
on <BLUE>Friday, Saturday and Sunday</BLUE>. Come and
check it out.

She's going to open a shop? Sounds kinda
suspicious...
